name: D-Lay Guetta Party Hard
description:
You have been summoned to DJ a famous party.

However in order to make the party last as long as possible you need to mantain the HYPEROMETER bar high.

1. Repair broken equipments:

  • Broken Speakers: Hold E to fix
  • Broken DJ Stand: Tap E repeatedly
  • BrokenTV: Press E when bar reaches correct range

2. Avoid the fun police that will stun you

3. Stay in place when everything is fixed and running smooth to dance and  increase your HYPEMETER.

4.Move with WASD keys

5. Punch (spacebar key): make your away trough the crowd with your special punch. be careful because punching people will reduce your hypemeter.
